name: Pandora Max Series Vol. 3: Rubbish Blazon
overview: Rubbish Blazon, the third game in the Pandora Max Series is a mix between a classic 2d rpg game with lots of humour and a first person perspective in the battles and an adventure game since in some parts of the game the player will be given different choices that will make the adventure go in a way or in another. In this game the player controls a group of bizarre characters that starts a wacky adventure inside a cave near his town.
